results.title: Targeted inhibition of JMJD2C/MALAT1 axis compensates for the deficiency of metformin in reversing ovarian cancer platinum resistance.
results.text_hl: Targeted inhibition of @GENE_KDM4C @GENE_23081 @@@JMJD2C@@@ synergistically enhanced the efficacy of low-dose @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in overcoming @<m>DISEASE_Lown_Ganong_Levine_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008151 @@@PR@@@, thus providing a promising approach for addressing @<m>DISEASE_Lown_Ganong_Levine_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008151 @@@PR@@@.

citations.NLM: Li L, Zhang J, Li H, Qin L, Wu H, Li Z, Cai L, Chen D, Yang J, Chen Y, Xie Y. Targeted inhibition of JMJD2C/MALAT1 axis compensates for the deficiency of metformin in reversing ovarian cancer platinum resistance. Life Sci. 2025 Apr 23;():123663. PMID: 40280301
